snippet: Chris Paul scored 24 points and made the shot that put the Clippers ahead for good against the Grizzlies in Game 3.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Clippers defeat Memphis Grizzlies, 87-86, to lead first round playoff series, 2-1; other results noted. (M)
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES -- Lob City, despite everything, is still here. The Clippers christened their home court Lob City in their high-flying days early this season, when they took over the town from the Lakers, however temporarily.
